response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. We believe its value far exceeds $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unique qualities and the dedication of our team. Considering its immense worth, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a masterpiece that could significantly enhance your collection or operations. We would be honored to have you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product.", "product_price": 1500000}
